CustomField.description: Contains an Image Representation of the Case's Priority Score - https://ikoussfsc.atlassian.net/browse/CLAIMSV2-30
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Case's Priority is determined by an accumulated score based on the following: Created by Sales 2 points), Job is in Progress ( 4 points), leaking (1 points). Maximum score is 7 minimum score is 0
CustomField.label: Priority Indicator
